import React, { useContext, useRef } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import nav_dropdown from '../Assets/nav_dropdown.png' const Navbar = () => { const {totalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext) const menuRef = useRef(); const dropdown_toggle = () => { } return (

Simple Goods

  • Fashion
  • Electronics
  • Sports
  • Accessories
{totalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar
